text: Michigan's 10th congressional district is a United States congressional district in the Lower Peninsula of Michigan. It is made up of Southern Macomb County, Rochester and Rochester Hills in Oakland County. From 2021 to 2022, Lisa McClain represented the 10th; after redistricting moved McClain to the neighboring 9th district, John E. James was elected to represent it since 2023. ==References== Category:Congressional districts of Michigan
title: Michigan's 10th congressional district
